entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 12:46 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
